name: SATURA
description:
Color has disappeared from the world. Face yourself to return it.

A short platformer, inspired by Celeste.

Controls:

  • A/D or ARROW KEYS to move
  • SPACE or Z to jump
  • ESC to restart level
  • ALT+SHIFT+ENTER to enter fullscreen (only works in the downloadable version).

(Generally, I would recommend the downloadable version over the web one for numerous various quirks that the web version loves to throw up. GameMaker's HTML5 export and I are mortal enemies.)

Made by ruby and BirbMom for MiniJam #111: Colors.
